name: Libirdy
description:
A narrative platformer by Beard or Die and Theresa Detloff.

This is the first installment of three episodes.

We plan to have Episode 2 up by June 7th, and if the response is good, we'll conclude with episode 3. If you would like us to complete all three episodes, let us know in the comments!

Wait for a post-jam version to play. Password for the obstinate is DontPlayThisVersion
